title: Generative AI on Vertex AI - 創建提示以生成代碼
abstract:
# Generative AI on Vertex AI - 創建提示以生成代碼
`gemini-1.0-pro` 和 `code-bison` 模型支持使用自然語言說明生成代碼。本主題介紹了創建可與 [支持的模型](#supported-code-generation-models) 搭配使用以生成代碼的提示的策略。
content:
## 使用場景
以下是代碼生成的一些常見應用場景：
- **單元測試** - 設計提示以請求對函數進行單元測試。
- **編寫函數** - 將問題傳遞給模型，以獲取可以解決問題的函數。
- **創建類** - 使用提示來說明類的用途，並具有用於定義返回的類的代碼。## 支持的模型
以下模型支持代碼生成任務：
- `gemini-1.0-pro`
- `code-bison`## 示例代碼生成提示
以下示例展示瞭如何設計代碼生成提示。
- [生成 Docker 腳本](#docker-script) 
- [生成函數](#generate-function) 
- [生成單元測試](#unit-test) 
### 生成 Docker 腳本
您可以使用代碼生成模型來生成 Docker 腳本。以下提示會生成一個 Docker 腳本，以創建安裝了特定內容庫的 Linux 機器：
| 0                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|:-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| 提示： Generate a Docker script to create a simple linux machine that has python 3.10 installed with following libraries: pandas, tensorflow, numpy 回答： ``` # Create a new Dockerfile FROM ubuntu:20.04 # Update the package list RUN apt-get update # Install Python 3.10 RUN apt-get install -y python3.10 # Install Python libraries RUN pip install pandas tensorflow numpy # Create a new user RUN useradd -m user # Set the default user USER user # Start the Python shell CMD ["python"] ``` To build the Docker image, run the following command: ``` docker build -t my-python-image . ``` To run the Docker image, run the following command: ``` docker run -it --rm my-python-image ``` This starts a new container based on the `my-python-image` image. You can then use the Python shell to interact with the container. For example, you can install additional Python libraries or run Python scripts. (gemini-1.0-pro) |
### 生成函數
您可以使用代碼生成模型來生成函數。以下提示會生成一個函數，該函數輸入年份並確定是否爲閏年：
| 0                                                                                                    |
|:-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| 提示： Write a function that checks if a year is a leap year. 回答： ```python def is_leap_year(year): """ def is_leap_year(year): """ Check if a year is a leap year. Args: year: The year to check. Returns: True if the year is a leap year, False otherwise. """ if year % 4 != 0: return False elif year % 100 == 0 and year % 400 != 0: return False else: return True ``` (gemini-1.0-pro) |
### 生成單元測試
您可以使用代碼生成模型來生成單元測試。
以下提示會爲函數生成單元測試，以確定某一年是否爲閏年。
| 0                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|:--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| 提示： Write a unit test for this function: def is_leap_year(year): """ Check if a year is a leap year. Args: year: The year to check. Returns: True if the year is a leap year, False otherwise. """ if year % 4 != 0: return False elif year % 100 == 0 and year % 400 != 0: return False else: return True 回答： ```python import unittest class IsLeapYearTest(unittest.TestCase): def test_is_leap_year_true(self): self.assertTrue(is_leap_year(2000)) self.assertTrue(is_leap_year(2004)) self.assertTrue(is_leap_year(2012)) def test_is_leap_year_false(self): self.assertFalse(is_leap_year(1900)) self.assertFalse(is_leap_year(1999)) self.assertFalse(is_leap_year(2100)) def test_is_leap_year_invalid_input(self): with self.assertRaises(TypeError): is_leap_year("2000") if __name__ == '__main__': unittest.main() ``` (gemini-1.0-pro) |
## 後續步驟
- 瞭解如何 [發送 Gemini 聊天提示請求](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/multimodal/send-chat-prompts-gemini?hl=zh-cn) 。
- 瞭解如何 [創建代碼聊天提示](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/code/code-chat-prompts?hl=zh-cn) 。
- 瞭解如何 [創建代碼補全提示](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/code/code-completion-prompts?hl=zh-cn) 。
- 瞭解 [負責任的 AI 最佳實踐和 Vertex AI 的安全過濾條件](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/responsible-ai?hl=zh-cn) 。
